Verify the shopping cart badge displays a count of 3 items, has circular shape with border radius 50%, background color #dc3545, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, and is positioned at x 150px, y 20px relative to the cart icon
Check the 'Confirm Deletion' modal dialog is hidden by default

Verify the 'Confirm Deletion' modal dialog becomes visible with fade-in animation duration of 300ms, width 400px, height 250px, centered with alignment to the viewport, over an opaque background overlay with opacity 0.7

Confirm the 'Remember me' checkbox is initially unchecked, has label 'Remember me', and aria-label 'Keep me logged in on this device'
Verify the 'Account' dropdown menu is initially hidden
Verify the 'Account' dropdown menu appears on hover
Verify the 'Account' dropdown menu has 5 visible items and width 180px
Verify each 'Account' dropdown menu item has padding 10px 15px
Check each product card has width 300px, height 450px, 1px solid border #e0e0e0, background color #ffffff, and all text content is aligned to the left
Ensure the success banner message 'Item added successfully!' has background color #d4edda, text color #155724, is visible for 5s, and then fades out with opacity reducing to 0 over 500ms
Confirm the table header cell for 'Product Name' has text 'Product Name', font weight 600, font size 14px, background color #f8f9fa, and padding 10px
Verify the image carousel scrolls horizontally by 300px per slide, with 400ms transition duration, and its scroll position is at scroll-left 0px when the first item is fully visible
Check the tooltip for the 'Help' icon is hidden by default
Verify the tooltip for the 'Help' icon becomes visible displaying text 'Contact support', has background color #343a40, text color #ffffff, and is positioned 8px below the icon
Ensure the loading spinner is visible, performs a rotating animation with 1s duration, has width 32px, height 32px, and opacity 1.0 during data fetching
Verify the loading spinner becomes hidden upon data load completion
Confirm the 'Date of Birth' input field has placeholder 'YYYY-MM-DD'

Confirm the 'Date of Birth' input field's associated calendar widget is hidden by default
Verify the user avatar image has source 'user_profile.png', border radius 50% for a circular shape, and rendered dimensions 48x48px

Check the 'New Message' notification toast appears at top 20px, right 20px, has background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, disappears automatically after 3s, and contains a close button with aria-label 'Dismiss notification'
Ensure the 'Shipping Address' section title has text 'Shipping Address', font size 20px, font weight 700, margin-bottom 15px, and 1px solid #dddddd bottom border
